column3: Latest;Siem Reap------:------ Three suspects were detained after a female German tourist was robbed.------All 3 are 18 years old and from the province.------The robbery occurred on November 2
column7: when the suspects grabbed the victim’s bag and escaped on a motorcycle.------They have confessed and are being sent to court.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/269777
